H0.text: Nino Farina was the first world champion of what. Grand Prix Racing

H1.text: Nino Farina was the first world champion of what. European Hill Climb Championship

H2.text: Nino Farina was the first world champion of what. 24 Hours of Le Mans

H3.text: Nino Farina was the first world champion of what. F1

A4.text: Farina won the Formula One World Drivers' Championship in its inaugural 1950 season
